definitions.definition: used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to a male person or animal previously mentioned or easily identified.
referring to a person or animal of unspecified sex (in modern use chiefly replaced by “him or her” or “them”).
examples: withdrawing your child from school to educate him at home may seem drastic

definitions.definition: often used in place of “he” after the verb “to be” and after “than” or “as” to refer to a male person or animal.

examples: in the depths of him, he too didn't want to go
